description:
Blurex is obsessed about quality, sourcing only the best material and craftsmanship to produce top of the line products.We understand you want to protect your investment from scratches and accidental drops yet still have that executive look.
We are proud to offer the new BLUREX Leather case for the Blackberry Playbook.

This case was handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail that meet the BLUREX standards.It includes a built in stand feature that allows you to convert the case into a stand,by slanting the Playbook into one if the four ridges.It also has all the necessary cutouts for easy access to all the cameras and ports.
title: Blurex Slim Leather Portfolio Case With 2 Tier Stand for Blackberry Playbook
